name: SCNPlane
desc: A rectangular, one-sided plane geometry of specified width and height.

items.name: init(width: CGFloat, height: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a plane geometry with the specified width and height.

items.name: var width: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the plane along its horizontal axis. Animatable.

items.name: var height: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the plane along its vertical axis. Animatable.

items.name: var widthSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in the plane’s surface along its horizontal axis. Animatable.

items.name: var heightSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in the plane’s surface along its vertical axis. Animatable.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of curvature for the plane’s corners. Animatable.

items.name: var cornerSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of line segments used to create each rounded corner of the plane. Animatable.
